mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_area(vertex1, vertex2, vertex3):
    (x1, y1) = vertex1
    (x2, y2) = vertex2
    (x3, y3) = vertex3
    area = abs((x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2)) * 2)
    return round(area)
